franchiseSelectionTitle: Create or select the franchise you want to register below
selectCategory: Select the category you want to register your team
cannotEditRegisteredTeam: Cannot edit franchise/team already accepted. If you need to make changes to the team you will need to ask the tournament organizer to remove the registration in order to be able to make any changes.
unRegisteringToTournament: Are you sure you want to unregister from the tournament?
lockChanges: Prevent tournament organizer from making any changes to your team
unlockChanges: Allow tournament organizer to make changes to your team details/roster
notLoggedIn: In order to be able to register on this tournament you need to <linkLogin>login</linkLogin>. If you do not have an account you can sign up on this <linkSignUp>link</linkSignUp>.
